name: Rodent Reunion
description:
You are a mouse, tasked with baking a strawberry cheesecake for your family reunion. But be careful! This is not your kitchen, and you run the risk of getting caught...

-

Made for a class project, all feedback is appreciated!

-

To play: download zip file, extract all, and select "Rodent Reunion" with the cheesecake icon || Windows only, MacOS coming soon...
